articles.title: Messi inspires Argentina to 3-0 Finalissima win over Italy
articles.description: National team success is finally coming for the seven-time Ballon d’Or winner, late in his trophy-filled club career.
articles.content:
Energized at Wembley by Lionel Messi’s assists, Argentina’s players threw their superstar teammate in the air after he inspired them to a second title in a year.

articles.title: Finalissima: Lionel Messi Stars as Argentina Beat Italy 3-0
articles.description: Lionel Messi starred as Copa America holders Argentina beat European champions Italy 3-0 in the Finalissima
articles.content:
Lionel Messi stole the show as Copa America holders Argentina powered to a 3-0 win against European champions Italy in the Finalissima at Wembley on Wednesday.

articles.description: Match report from Wembley as Copa America holders Argentina won the Finalissima against European champions Italy with Lionel Messi starring for the South Americans
articles.content:
Argentina won the Finalissima with a convincing 3-0 win over Italy at a packed Wembley.
